entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -29.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -29.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 70 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
